body.name: 30S Fast Heat-up Remove Wrinkles Steamer for Clothes 30 mins Continuous Steam, 1350W Handheld Clothes Steamers for Home Curtains Clothes with 380ML Detachable Water Tank and Heat Insulation Gloves
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 6 hrs
features: 【𝐑𝐄𝐌𝐎𝐕𝐄𝐒 𝐖𝐑𝐈𝐍𝐊𝐋𝐄𝐒 𝐄𝐅𝐅𝐈𝐂𝐈𝐄𝐍𝐓𝐋𝐘】- Travel steamer for clothes with 1350W powerful steam, steam can penetrate deep into the fabric area, instantly smooths wrinkles on clothes, remove odors.
【𝟑𝟎𝐒 𝐅𝐀𝐒𝐓 𝐈𝐑𝐎𝐍𝐈𝐍𝐆】- Clothes steamer heats up quickly within 30S. 380ml removable water tank can be continuously steamed for 30mins, reducing the hassle of frequent water additions.

【𝐌𝐔𝐋𝐓𝐈𝐅𝐔𝐍𝐂𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍𝐀𝐋 𝐇𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐇𝐄𝐋𝐃 𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐀𝐌𝐄𝐑】- Handheld steamer iron for clothes can be used not only for clothes made of cotton, wool, polyester, blends, jean, plush, satin, fiber, nylon, liner and other fabrics, also a good choice for cleaning bedding, table cloths, sofas, curtains, upholstery, and toys. Steam jets are very safe, so there is no need to worry about scratching or scalding the fabric.

【𝐇𝐄𝐀𝐓 𝐈𝐍𝐒𝐔𝐋𝐀𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍 𝐆𝐋𝐎𝐕𝐄𝐒】- Hand ironing gloves have built-in finger loops to help you better hold the glove in place. The thick sponge inside the glove effectively prevents the penetration of steam and provides full protection for your hands and wrists. It also works as a mini-ironing board to help you iron your clothes more smoothly. Holding a clothes steamer in one hand and a glove in the other is convenient and keeps clothes neater.

【𝐒𝐀𝐅𝐄 & 𝐋𝐄𝐀𝐊𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐎𝐅】- Steamer for clothes with leak-proof technology, the clothes steamer won't spill or spray hot water no matter what angle you're ironing from, and keep your clothes dry. The lightweight and wide base design prevents the steamer iron for clothes from tipping over.

【𝐏𝐎𝐑𝐓𝐀𝐁𝐋𝐄 𝐓𝐑𝐀𝐕𝐄𝐋 𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐀𝐌𝐄𝐑】- Place your travel steamer iron for clothes, fabric brush, heat insulated gloves and mini water cup in the pouch the clothes steamer comes with and just place it in your suitcase or backpack of any size. So, you don't have to worry about clothes full of creases and wrinkles when you're on business, for short or long trips.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: POWERFUL STEAMER FOR CLOTHES Powerful steamer for clothes with 1350W powerful steam, steam penetrate deep into the fabric area, instantly smooths wrinkles on clothes, remove odors. Learn More 360°LEAK-PROOF CLOTHES STEAMER Steam your clothes while hanging vertically or lying horizontally, without the worry of drips or stains. Learn More 3 STEAM LEVELS HANDHELD STEAMER Low, medium and high mode for you to choose, steam volume of different gears is different, select different steam levels for light or thick clothes. Learn More SUITS FOR VARIOUS MATERIALS STEAMER Garment steam is not just for clothes, but for every fabric that needs to be ironed at home, such as bedding, sofas, curtains, ect. Learn More PORTABLE TRAVEL STEAMER FOR CLOTHES Portable travel steamer for clothes is perfect for business trips, holidays, destination weddings or anywhere you need to quickly. Learn More

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very, very good steamer
reviews.reviewText: This steamer checks all the boxes:☑ Ready as soon as you turn it on. Literally, it shoots steam the moment you flip the switch.☑ Incredibly efficient. Unlike smaller steamers, this one takes one pass.☑ Multiple steaming intensity modes: Red light (high), Blue light (medium), Green light (low). Tip: Just use the low intensity mode (Green light), the water lasts a lot longer that way and the wrinkles still come off very, very easy.☑ Comfortable switch to turn On and Off. When I'm changing garments to steam, turning off the steamer saves water, so that's fewer trips to the sink to refill the tank.☑ Refilling the tank is very easy. The opening to refill the tank is big enough to easily fill it up in the sink without using the provided cup.☑ The largest capacity tank of the traveling steamers I found here on Amazon. This means, fewer trips to the sink to refill.Notes:— After about 30 minutes of use, the top of the handle, the “neck” that meets the steaming head, gets quite hot, so you will need to adjust your grip a little lower.— It can get heavy after a while of using it.Very satisfied with this steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very simple to use. It heats up almost instantly. About 3 or 4 seconds it is producing steam. Does a very nice job removing the wrinkles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works but...
reviews.reviewText: Came in time for travel abroad but didn't bring for restricted use of it. It works just fine, the handle and the size of it fits perfectly in my hand, not too heavy! Strong steam and did my shirt in no time, still have to try it on other fabric but with the accessories it came with, not worried about burning the delicate fabric, very content with the fast heat steamer. Wish I bought this a long time ago!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars remove wrinkles instantly
reviews.reviewText: I had been searching for a convenient clothes steamer for a while, but was hesitant about the hanging steamer's effectiveness. Surprisingly, it's easy to use, with fast heat-up to remove wrinkles instantly, making ironing clothes flat much easier than with a traditional iron. No need to worry about wrinkles anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkles Fall Right Out
reviews.reviewText: I bought this steamer because I was sick of ironing my clothes and it's worked like a charm. I used it on a dress with a full circle skirt and the wrinkles fell right out after I let the steamer heat up for a minute like the directions saidThe handle didn't get hot when I was using the steamer, which was a plus. Some irons get toasty when they're on for a while, so I was a little apprehensive, but it worked out just fine. The steam came out in a predictable direction, too, so I didn't have to worry about burning myself. I liked how you can select a continuous stream or do bursts of steam with the toggle on the front of the handleI haven't used the brush attachment yet, so I can't speak for that, but the pad worked very well. I liked the mesh pocket on the back that I could slip my hand into and navigate it around my garment. The beaker was also really helpful for filling the reservoir; the tip fit the hole at the top of the reservoir perfectly so it was easy to fill and I didn't spill. The carrying bag fits everything, too, which is nice, but the directions say to store the steamer in a standing position, so I just keep the accessories in the bag next to the steamerThe only complaint I have is that the cord feels really, really short. I accidentally pulled it out from the wall a couple times when I was steaming my dress. I also steamed some curtains and I couldn't get to the top of them with the steamer because the cord didn't reach

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was influenced by the great reviews.
reviews.reviewText: I have not yet been able to fully discover it’s potential, having just received it in past couple of days. What I can say is that it came beautifully packaged and has wonderful instructions for use, the best I’ve ever seen. I was curious and put it together very quickly and easily. I tried it out on a dress that was very wrinkled. I was very cautious about how much steam to use on the dress that clearly stated, dry clean only. As a result I did not get the result I hoped for as I was afraid to ruin it.I next used it on a bedspread and it worked beautifully. On the Con side I found as others had, that the water reservoir opening was a bit too small but with the adjustment of water flow it posed no real problem. Another minor thing I discovered was that the brush attachment didn’t stay attached very securely. Other than what I mentioned, I found it to be very comfortable to handle, very well designed and I hope to be able to put it to good use in many different ways. I will update the review of this product after a reasonable amount of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The water tank came out of the box wet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This steamer works great and is easy to use! I used it on my very wrinkled curtains and they look great!
Sin duda lo recomiendo, llevo usándolo poco pero si cumple con el propósito para lo que la compre y es de calidad
